alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 4:47AM MST until January 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
